text.value: Education background of participant or parent/guardian for < 15
When did you become ill (illness onset date)?
Signs and Symptoms presented by patient
Signs and Symptoms presented by patient
Signs and Symptoms presented by patient
Signs and Symptoms presented by patient
Signs and Symptoms presented by patient
Signs and Symptoms presented by patient
Signs and Symptoms presented by patient
Do you know any person who had similar clinical signs in two weeks before or in the two weeks after becoming ill in your household?
What is the relationship of that person with the patient?
Mention other relationship of that person with the patient?
Which type of poultry meat did you consume?
Mention other type of poultry meat you consume
What was the source of the poultry meat that was consumed?
Mention other source of the poultry meat consumed
Did you eat wild red meat?
If above answer is yes, specify wild red meat you eat
How was the eaten red meat prepared?
Did you eat well cooked meat?
Which livestock or pet do you own?
Have you been in contact with animals?
Playing in an area with bird droppings
What is your water source for household activities?
Mention other water source, if any
Drinking water directly from surface source (lake, river, pond, well)
Do you have any of the following chronic diseases?
Did you use cutting board for cutting raw meat?
Did you wash cutting board after cutting raw meat?
Did you clean a knife when using it for raw meat and other foods?
Did you wash hands with soap and water after touching raw food?
How often do you change dish cloth (≥2/week)?
Which types of toilets/latrines do you have at home?
Which of the following raw food (vegetables, mushroom, fruits) did you eat?
Other raw food did you eat
In the month before the onset of illness, did you take antibiotics?
What was the source of these antibiotics?
Do you wash hands after contact with livestock?
Do you wash hands before feeding a child?
Do you wash the child’s hands after defecation?
What do you use to clean utensils?
Do you use livestock manure in agriculture
Do you have access to land fertilized with manure?
Did you eat outside of the home?
Did you travel outside the Tanzania?
Do you have a separate house for livestock?
Do you have any comments about this research on Campylobacter species?
Please take gps point where you collect data
Historia ya elimu ya mshiriki au mzazi / mlezi wa mtoto chini ya miaka 15
Ishara na Dalili zinazowasilishwa na mgonjwa
Ishara na Dalili zinazowasilishwa na mgonjwa
Ishara na Dalili zinazowasilishwa na mgonjwa
Ishara na Dalili zinazowasilishwa na mgonjwa
Ishara na Dalili zinazowasilishwa na mgonjwa
Ishara na Dalili zinazowasilishwa na mgonjwa
Ishara na Dalili zinazowasilishwa na mgonjwa
Je! Unajua mtu yeyote unayeishi naye nyumba moja ambaye alikuwa na dalili za ugonjwa kama zako katika wiki mbili kabla au katika wiki mbili baada ya wewe kuugua?
Je kuna uhusiano gani kati ya huyo mtu na mgonjwa?
Taja uhusiano mwingine kati ya huyo mtu na mgonjwa?
Je, ulikula nyama ya kuku au jamii nyingine ya ndege katika wiki mbili zilizopita?
Matumizi/ulaji wa nyama ya kuku na jamii nyingine ya ndege
Je, ulikula aina gani ya nyama ya kuku/ndege?
Taja aina nyingine ya nyama ya kuku/ndege?
Nini ilikuwa chanzo cha nyama hiyo?
Taja chanzo kingine cha nyama hiyo
Je, ulikula nyama nyekundu ya pori
Kama jibu la juu ndiyo, jaza aina ya nyama nyekundu
Je, mifugo au mnyama wa nyumbani gani unayo?
Ulicheza katika eneo na kinyesi cha ndege
Je, ni aina gani ya chanzo cha maji kwa matumizi ya nyumbani?
Taja aina nyingine ya chanzo cha maji
Ni hali gani ya maji ya kunywa?
Kunywa maji moja kwa moja kutoka chanzo cha uso (ziwa, mto, bwawa, kisima)
Kunywa maji moja kwa moja kutoka kwenye bomba
Taja aina nyingine ya maji ya kunywa
Je, ni magonjwa gani ya kudumu unayo?
Ujali kuhusu Jikoni na Utunzaji wa Chakula
Je, unatumia ubao kukata nyama mbichi?
Je, unaosha ubao baada ya kukata nyama mbichi?
Je! unsafisha kisu baada ya kukata nyama mbichi na kabla ya kukitumia kwa vyakula vingine?
Je, unaosha mikono na sabuni na maji baada ya kugusa chakula kibichi?
Je, unabadilisha kitambaa cha kukaushia sahani mara kwa mara (≥2 / wiki)?
Ni aina gani ya choo kitumikacho?
Je, ulikula chakula ghafi/ambacho hakijapikwa (mboga, uyoga na matunda)?
Taja aina nyingine ya chakula ghafi
Je, ulitumia antibiotics mwezi mmoja kabla ya kuugua?
Je, unaosha mikono baada ya kuhudumia au kuwa karibu na mifugo?
Je, unaosha mikono kabla ya kumlisha mtoto?
Je, unaosha mikono ya mtoto baada ya kujisaidia choo kubwa?
Je! Unatumia mbolea ya wanyama katika kilimo?
Je, Una uhusiano na ardhi yenye mbolea?
Je, huwa unakula nje ya nyumbani?
Je! Unaishi nyumba tofauti na mifugo?
Je unafikiri nini ni chanzo cha ugonjwa unaougua
Je! Una maoni yoyote kuhusu utafiti huu wa Campylobacter?
Tafadhali chukua gps ya eneo ulipochukulia taarifa
